imagingelement: 1/2.5-inch square pixel color CCD (total pixels: 7.41 million)
recordingmedia: Built-in flash memory (image area: 11.6 MB), SDHC Memory Card / SD Memory Card / Multimedia Card compatible
imagefileformat: Still images: JPEG (Exif Version 2.2), DCF standard, DPOF compliant Movies: H.264/AVC, MOV format (Motion JPEG AVI format when the image quality setting is “LP”) Audio: WAV (stereo)
